cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's daigaku

sentence.kanji: 大学に行ってもっと勉強したいです。
sentence.romaji: daigaku ni ite moto benkyou shitai desu
sentence.english: I want to go to college and study more.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tokei

sentence.kanji: 時計を見たらちょうど3時だった。
sentence.romaji: tokei wo mitara choudo sanji data
sentence.english: I looked at the clock and it was exactly three.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kakinaosu

sentence.kanji: この書類を書き直してください。
sentence.romaji: kono shorui wo kakinaoshite kudasai
sentence.english: Please rewrite this document.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hanasu

sentence.kanji: 母と電話で話しました。
sentence.romaji: haha to denwa de hanashimashita
sentence.english: I spoke to my mother on the phone.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kaku

sentence.kanji: 彼に手紙を書きました。
sentence.romaji: kare ni tegami wo kakimashita
sentence.english: I wrote him a letter.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yomu

sentence.kanji: 彼女は雑誌を読んでいます。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha zashi wo yonde imasu
sentence.english: She's reading the magazine.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kotoba

sentence.kanji: この言葉の意味が分かりません。
sentence.romaji: kono kotoba no imi ga wakarimasen
sentence.english: I don't understand the meaning of this word.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's oboeru

sentence.kanji: 妹は平仮名を全部覚えました。
sentence.romaji: imouto ha hiragana wo zenbu oboemashita
sentence.english: My little sister learned all the hiragana.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's iu

sentence.kanji: 上司が「一杯、飲もう。」と言った。
sentence.romaji: joushi ga ipai nomou to ita
sentence.english: My boss said: "Let's have a drink."

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kataru

sentence.kanji: 今夜は大いに語りましょう。
sentence.romaji: konya ha ooini katarimashou
sentence.english: Let's talk about everything tonight.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sameru

sentence.kanji: 今朝は6時に目が覚めた。
sentence.romaji: kesa ha rokuji ni me ga sameta
sentence.english: I woke up at six o'clock this morning.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's samasu

sentence.kanji: 子供が目を覚ました。
sentence.romaji: kodomo ga me wo samashita
sentence.english: The child woke up.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hanashiau

sentence.kanji: 私たちはよく話し合いました。
sentence.romaji: watashitachi ha yoku hanashiaimashita
sentence.english: We often talked to each other.

cards.english: observation tour, study tour, field trip
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kengaku

sentence.kanji: 今日、工場の見学に行きました。
sentence.romaji: kyou koujou no kengaku ni ikimashita
sentence.english: We went on a field trip to a factory today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hanashi

sentence.kanji: あなたの話は面白いね。
sentence.romaji: anata no hanashi ha omoshiroi ne
sentence.english: Your story's interesting.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yomi

sentence.kanji: 母に読み書きを習いました。
sentence.romaji: haha ni yomikaki wo naraimashita
sentence.english: I learned reading and writing from my mother.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chuugaku

sentence.kanji: 息子は中学に通っています。
sentence.romaji: musuko ha chuugaku ni kayote imasu
sentence.english: My son goes to junior high.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gengo

sentence.kanji: 彼はアジアの言語を研究している。
sentence.romaji: kare ha ajia no gengo wo kenkyuu shite iru
sentence.english: He's doing research in Asian languages.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's soudan

sentence.kanji: 相談したいことがあります。
sentence.romaji: soudan shitai koto ga arimasu
sentence.english: I'd like to get your advice on something.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shiraberu

sentence.kanji: この単語の意味を辞書で調べましょう。
sentence.romaji: kono tango no imi wo jisho de shirabemashou
sentence.english: Let's look up the meaning of this word in the dictionary.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hagaki

sentence.kanji: 家族に葉書を書いています。
sentence.romaji: kazoku ni hagaki wo kaiteimasu 。
sentence.english: I wrote a postcard to my family.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mezamashidokei

sentence.kanji: 7時に目覚まし時計が鳴りました。
sentence.romaji: shichiji ni mezamashidokei ga narimashita
sentence.english: The alarm clock went off at seven o'clock.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's joudan

sentence.kanji: 冗談は止めてください。
sentence.romaji: joudan ha yamete kudasai
sentence.english: Please stop joking.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's keigo

sentence.kanji: お客様には敬語を使いなさい。
sentence.romaji: okyakusama ni ha keigo wo tsukainasai
sentence.english: Use polite language to customers.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mioboe

sentence.kanji: この人に見覚えがありますか。
sentence.romaji: kono hito ni mioboe ga arimasu ka
sentence.english: Do you remember seeing this person?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mezamashi

sentence.kanji: 目覚ましにコーヒーを飲んだの。
sentence.romaji: mezamashi ni ko-hi- wo nonda no
sentence.english: I drank coffee to wake up.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hanashiai

sentence.kanji: プロジェクトメンバーと話し合いをしたの。
sentence.romaji: purojiekuto menba- to hanashiai wo shita no
sentence.english: I had a discussion with the project members.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gogaku

sentence.kanji: 海外で語学の勉強をします。
sentence.romaji: kaigai de gogaku no benkyou wo shimasu
sentence.english: I will study a language abroad.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hakaru

sentence.kanji: 100メートル走のタイムを計ったんだ。
sentence.romaji: 100 me-torusou no taimu wo hakata n da
sentence.english: I timed the 100m race.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's goukei

sentence.kanji: 合計金額を計算してください。
sentence.romaji: goukei kingaku wo keisan shite kudasai
sentence.english: Please calculate the total amount of money.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kei

sentence.kanji: 3人分の代金は計6000円です。
sentence.romaji: sanninbun no daikin ha kei rokusenen desu
sentence.english: The cost for three people is 6000 yen in total.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's oboe

sentence.kanji: この子は覚えが早いね。
sentence.romaji: kono ko ha oboe ga hayai ne
sentence.english: This kid remembers things quickly.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yomikaki

sentence.kanji: 息子は学校で読み書きを勉強しています。
sentence.romaji: musuko ha gakou de yomikaki wo benkyou shite imasu
sentence.english: My son studies reading and writing at school.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kougaku

sentence.kanji: 彼は大学で工学を勉強しました。
sentence.romaji: kare ha daigaku de kougaku wo benkyou shimashita
sentence.english: He studied engineering in college.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shitagaki

sentence.kanji: 今、論文の下書きをしているところです。
sentence.romaji: ima ronbun no shitagaki wo shite iru tokoro desu
sentence.english: I am in the middle of the thesis draft now.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gansho

sentence.kanji: 今日大学に願書を送りました。
sentence.romaji: kyou daigaku ni gansho wo okurimashita
sentence.english: Today I sent an application form to the college.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hitokoto

sentence.kanji: 社長に一言お願いしたの。
sentence.romaji: shachou ni hitokoto onegai shita no
sentence.english: I asked the president to deliver a brief speech.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kouchou

sentence.kanji: 今月はエアコンの売り上げが好調です。
sentence.romaji: kongetsu ha eakon no uriage ga kouchou desu
sentence.english: Sales of air conditioners are good this month.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shitashirabe

sentence.kanji: まず第一に、しっかり下調べをしなさい。
sentence.romaji: mazu daiichi ni shikari shitashirabe wo shinasai
sentence.english: First of all, be sure to make a careful preliminary investigation.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's choushi

sentence.kanji: 体の調子がとても良いです。
sentence.romaji: karada no choushi ga totemo ii desu
sentence.english: I'm in good physical condition.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yabureru

sentence.kanji: 私のチームは1回戦で敗れたよ。
sentence.romaji: watashi no chi-mu ha 1 kaisen de yabureta yo
sentence.english: My team lost in the first round.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's dokusho

sentence.kanji: 私の趣味は読書です。
sentence.romaji: watashi no shumi ha dokusho desu
sentence.english: My hobby is reading.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's junchou

sentence.kanji: 進み具合は全て順調です。
sentence.romaji: susumi guai ha subete junchou desu
sentence.english: It is all progressing well.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sakaeru

sentence.kanji: ここはかつてゴールドラッシュで栄えた町だよ。
sentence.romaji: koko ha katsute go-rudo rashu de sakaeta machi da yo
sentence.english: This town once prospered during the Gold Rush.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shirabe

sentence.kanji: 警察の調べで女性の身元がわかりました。
sentence.romaji: keisatsu no shirabe de josei no mimoto ga wakarimashita
sentence.english: An investigation by the police uncovered the woman's identity.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kakikotoba

sentence.kanji: 書き言葉と話し言葉はだいぶ違うことがあります。
sentence.romaji: kakikotoba to hanashikotoba ha daibu chigau koto ga arimasu
sentence.english: Written language and spoken language are sometimes quite different.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hanashikotoba

sentence.kanji: 話し言葉と書き言葉は少し違いますね。
sentence.romaji: hanashikotoba to kakikotoba ha sukoshi chigaimasu ne
sentence.english: The spoken and written language are a little different.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kunyomi

sentence.kanji: 漢字には音読みと訓読みがあります。
sentence.romaji: kanji ni ha onyomi to kunyomi ga arimasu
sentence.english: Every kanji has both Chinese-derived and Japanese pronunciations.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kun

sentence.kanji: 漢字の読み方には、音と訓の2通りがあるの。
sentence.romaji: kanji no yomikata ni ha on to kun no futatoori ga aru no
sentence.english: There are two ways to pronounce kanji: the Chinese-derived reading and the Japanese reading.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sewa

sentence.kanji: 旅行の間、犬の世話をしてください。
sentence.romaji: ryokou no aida inu no sewa wo shite kudasai
sentence.english: Please take care of the dog while we're on our trip.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's keikoku

sentence.kanji: 車に駐車違反の警告を貼られました。
sentence.romaji: kuruma ni chuusha ihan no keikoku wo hararemashita
sentence.english: A parking ticket was stuck on the car.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's senkou

sentence.kanji: 大学では物理を専攻していました。
sentence.romaji: daigaku de ha butsuri wo senkou shite imashita
sentence.english: I majored in physics at university.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's semeru

sentence.kanji: 彼は積極的に攻めたが勝てなかったな。
sentence.romaji: kare ha sekyokuteki ni semeta ga katenakata na
sentence.english: He didn't win although he put up a good attack.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shodou

sentence.kanji: 書道をすると姿勢も良くなります。
sentence.romaji: shodou wo suru to shisei mo yoku narimasu
sentence.english: Posture also improves when you study calligraphy.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shi

sentence.kanji: 彼女の詩は世界中で有名になったんだ。
sentence.romaji: kanojo no shi ha sekaijuu de yuumei ni nata n da
sentence.english: Her poetry became famous all over the world.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsumeru

sentence.kanji: かばんに荷物を詰めました。
sentence.romaji: kaban ni nimotsu wo tsumemashita
sentence.english: I packed my things into the bag.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsumaru

sentence.kanji: プリンタのインクが詰まってしまいました。
sentence.romaji: purinta no inku ga tsumate shimaimashita
sentence.english: The printer's ink got blocked up.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mezamashii

sentence.kanji: あの国は目覚ましい発展を遂げたの。
sentence.romaji: ano kuni ha mezamashii haten wo togeta no
sentence.english: That country accomplished remarkable development.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's uyamau

sentence.kanji: 両親を敬うことは大切です。
sentence.romaji: ryoushin wo uyamau koto ha taisetsu desu
sentence.english: It is important to respect your parents.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's manabu

sentence.kanji: 私は哲学を学んでいます。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha tetsugaku wo manande imasu
sentence.english: I study philosophy.
